Annotation.yaml: Data Annotations expand assets and single data points with reliability and trustworthiness information.

AssetDiscovery.yaml: The Asset Discovery API facilitates exploration and inspection of available assets.

Authentication.yaml: Provides the mechanism for a tool or experiment to acquire authentication from a user.

Authorisation.html: Authorisation enables applications to restrict actions only to permitted users.

DataSource.yaml: The Data Source API provides access to the data stored in Organicity.

ExperimentationManagement.yaml: This document specifies the API to programmatically manage experiments running on the OrganiCity platform.

ExperimentationMonitoring.yaml: Monitorisation of experiments taking place in OrganiCity platform.

PlatformManagement.yaml: Connect new sites to the OrganiCity platform, as well as perform the management of its related attributes.

Scenarios.yaml: Interact with Organicity Scenarios to create, update and rate ideas.

SmartphoneExperimentation.yaml: The API for interacting with the Smartphone Experimentation Platform.
